PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10562022-10-07,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 3 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE 3 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT in order to (1) ensure that the greenhouse gas emissions and emission reductions quantified under Part 2 of the Act are estimated using up-to-date scientific knowledge; (2) replace the global warming potential values from the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change's Fourth Assessment Report with those from the Fifth Assessment Report for the greenhouse gases listed in Schedule 3; and (3) clarify the names of perfluorocarbons in Schedule 3 by adding their acronyms in addition to their molecular formulas, as is currently the case for hydrofluorocarbons.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0210 Publication Date: 2022-10-26
AttachmentsAttachment
